Sentencas: Barium cerate has high proton conductivity but poor chemical stability in presence of CO2 as well as H2O. However, barium zirconate is chemically stable but has poor protonic conductivity.
Titulo: Synthesis, stability and conductivity of BaCe0.8-xZrxY0.2O3-δ as electrolyte for proton conducting SOFC

Sentencas: To combine above two effects, BaCe0.8-xZrxY0.2O3-delta (BCZY, with x = 0.0, 0.2, 0.4, 0.6 and 0.8) powders were synthesized by a Pechini method.
Titulo: Synthesis, stability and conductivity of BaCe0.8-xZrxY0.2O3-δ as electrolyte for proton conducting SOFC

Sentencas: Lattice parameters as generated from X-ray diffraction studies were found to decrease with increase in Zr content.
Titulo: Synthesis, stability and conductivity of BaCe0.8-xZrxY0.2O3-δ as electrolyte for proton conducting SOFC

Sentencas: Compositions with x >= 0.4, were found to exhibit enhanced chemical stability in presence of carbon dioxide.
Titulo: Synthesis, stability and conductivity of BaCe0.8-xZrxY0.2O3-δ as electrolyte for proton conducting SOFC

Sentencas: Proton conductivity of BCZY samples were measured using impedance spectroscopy in moist N-2 atmosphere and activation energy for proton conduction was determined.
Titulo: Synthesis, stability and conductivity of BaCe0.8-xZrxY0.2O3-δ as electrolyte for proton conducting SOFC

Sentencas: Based on this study, BaCe0.4Zr0.4Y0.2O3-delta composition was suggested as a suitable electrolyte material.
Titulo: Synthesis, stability and conductivity of BaCe0.8-xZrxY0.2O3-δ as electrolyte for proton conducting SOFC
